additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Coconut Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Triethanolamine, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Menthol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation develops, discontinue use of product.

description: Gillette Pure Soothing Shave Cream With Aloe
name: Pure Soothing Shave Cream With Aloe
